main.name: Chew Hoa Shen
main.description: studying at National University of Singapore
main.bio: I am a year 2 computer science undergraduate at National University of Singapore, passionate about building software that can help others.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Designed and built a java library to be used by clients, practicing test-driven development, SOLID principles and continous integration to write scalable and maintainable code.

work.title: Frontend Developer Intern
work.description: Developed and delivered new features for the company's mobile application, leading up to its launch date. Participated in weekly scrum meetings and sprint review meetings.

work.title: Digital Marketing Intern
work.description: Created and launched new campaigns as well as performed analysis and optimization of ongoing online campaigns for lead generation and brand awareness. Performed content marketing through blogs/articles and social media management

projects.title: Deals Together
projects.category: A social platform that allows users to track the price of item listings on Amazon.sg, view their friends' watchlists and send/receive recommendations to/from friends. Built on React, Django and Postgresql.

projects.title: Interview Manager
projects.category: A web application built for job seekers to help them keep track of their job applications and interviews. It is a simple CRUD app that allows users to add or delete applications from their watchlist as well as update the status of their applications and interviews. Built on React and Django.

projects.title: Archangel
projects.category: A desktop application built for clinicians to help them manage their appointment schedule. Users can create patients and assign patients to appointments and are provided with the ability to edit and filter patient and appointment records in various ways. Built on Java and JavaFX.

projects.title: iFinance
projects.category: A mobile application built to help users keep account of their daily expenditure. Users can set daily budgets and view their expenditure over periods of time. Built on React and Firebase.

projects.title: Duke Chatbot
projects.category: A desktop application built to help users keep track of their tasks. Users can create todo tasks, deadlines, events and weekly recurring tasks. Filtering features are also provided to help users better manage their tasks. Built on Java and JavaFX.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
